description:
Kaoru-tan has joined forces with a wife that can`t cook and they`re unstoppable!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arukinareta Michi ni Se o Mukete Hashitte Mita Kekka
Ce qui arrive quand on court dans le sens inverse du chemin qu’on a l`habitude de prendre
What Happened When I Turned My Back to the Path I Was Used to and Started Running
歩きなれた道に背を向けて走ってみた結果
